snippet: Prosecutors opted not to file for the lesser offense of homicide because of aggravating circumstances, including the violent nature of the woman’s death.
abstract: Philippine prosecutors recommend that United States Marine Pfc Joseph Scott Pemberton be charged with murder in connection with death of Jennifer Laude, Filipino transgender woman.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors opted not to file for the lesser offense of homicide because of aggravating circumstances, including the violent nature of the woman’s death.

headline.main: Murder Charge Is Recommended for U.S. Marine in Death of Transgender Filipino
headline.print_headline: The Philippines: Marine in Murder Case

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
